control.description: estuary style vertical codec flags top right aligned for logo
Main Mainscreen Streamsetup Help about what to do
control.label: All available channels are in addons.ini and folders.list. This will help you add your own custom channels.

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do
control.label: strm|m3u|pvr | Choose stream from external strm|m3u|pvr playlist file.

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: Favourites | Add a channel from your Favourites

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: addons.ini | Choose from your available channels in addons.ini. "Addons Choose" for more.

control.description: Mainscreen Textbox Help about what to do 2
control.label: Addons Choose | Browse video addons and choose channel sources to add in folders.list (Refresh Addons.ini afterwards).
Choose stream or substream from strm|m3u playlist to add to addons.ini.
Import Playlist from strm|m3u playlist to add to addons.ini.
Import PVR channels and add to addons.ini.

control.description: subscriptions Help about what to do
control.label: Inside an addon right click and save a channel to "favourites". Then you can select it on the right and set it as the channel.
You can select a channel from your PVR. If blank, go to strm|m3u, click Import PVR, exit out and come back to this screen.

control.description: subscriptions Help about what to do
control.label: Click on the addon icon and wait until the addon loads. Then browse to the directory you want and click Add Folder button.
